https://tmrev.io/movie/35821-Daytime Drinking 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/1ujDGE5eP9DOWzg52soheUAQL0y.jpg Hyuk-Jin has just broken up with his girlfriend and decides to take a trip to Jeongseon in the province of Gangwon-do. The next day, his friends are too hung over to get up, so Hyuk-Jin makes his way to his destination alone. A trip of opportunity takes a cruel and unexpected turn as misunderstanding and crossed paths occur over and over again. Daytime Drinking
